nodes.text: Boize was a male Human who served in the Galactic Empire as a General. Boize was known as a yes-man.

Boize was a general in the Galactic Empire assigned to oversee the refitting and transportation of power generators captured from the former Rebel base on Dantooine. They were refitted on Corellia, and it was there that Boize was assassinated by a Rebel agent.
